info.description: API documentation for the Sentinel 4337 backend service.
info.title: Sentinel 4337 Backend API

get.description: Returns the configured address for supported contracts: entrypoint, simple_account_factory, paymaster.

get.summary: Retrieve compiled contract artifacts by name

post.description: Handles pm_getPaymasterData and pm_getPaymasterStubData for the configured paymaster.

get.description: Returns the authenticated admin's identifier and username.

get.summary: List paymasters for the authenticated admin

post.description: Registers a paymaster entry-point association and optional user whitelist.

get.summary: Get the authenticated admin's paymaster details
List whitelisted contracts for the paymaster

post.summary: Add or update a contract whitelist entry

get.summary: List recorded user operations for the paymaster

post.summary: Add a user to the paymaster whitelist

patch.summary: Replace the entire paymaster user whitelist

delete.summary: Remove a user from the paymaster whitelist

get.summary: List sponsored user operations for a paymaster

post.description: Authenticates an admin and returns a JWT access token.
